column5: an American man was found dead in a room on St 118.------The victim
column7: a 65 year old American lived in the 2nd floor apartment.------A neighbor alerted police
column8: who went to the property and found the victim lying on the floor.  Authorities concluded he had suffered a heart attack.------After the incident
column9: the victim was transported to Wat Teuk Thla Pagoda
column10: waiting to be contacted by relatives and relatives. ------POST NEWS
